Freelance Services

February 09, 2026 •

Freelance Development & System Integrations

Websites • Automation • Backend Services • Integrations

Full-stack developer available for freelance projects ranging from small website fixes to full backend systems and workflow automation. I help businesses repair broken systems, connect platforms together, and automate repetitive operational tasks.

Short-term, one-off, and ongoing contract work available. No project is too small.

Websites & Platforms
  • WordPress / Elementor troubleshooting and builds
  • WooCommerce checkout, payment, and workflow fixes
  • Shopify / Magento backend customization
  • Website performance optimization
Integrations & Automation
  • API integrations (payments, CRM, scheduling systems)
  • Zapier / Make workflow automation
  • Email notification and autoresponder systems
  • Form-to-CRM and reporting integrations
Backend & Data Services
  • AWS backend services (Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3)
  • Automation tools and backend scripting
  • Web scraping and data pipelines
  • Operational dashboards and reporting systems
Common Requests
  • Fixing broken forms or integrations
  • Connecting websites to third-party systems
  • Automating manual business workflows
  • Improving reliability of existing platforms
  • Building custom internal tools
Have a project in mind?

Send a short description of the work needed, timeline, and budget range.
